resources.string: Note: Lionheart tweaks are modifications for the Conservative Governor. Once enabled the Conservative Governor will have the Lionheart tweaks activated.
By clicking here you are going to download the N.E.A.K. OTA Updater App
Please be sure you are connected to internet via WiFi or 3G

This app is for controlling the NEAK kernel options without having to use the CWM Recovery
 This app is also used for downloading the NEAK kernel OTA updater App
 
 The current options that this app can control are:
 Conservative Governor
 Lionheart Tweaks (for Conservative Governor)
 Lazy Governor
 Lagfree Governor
 SCHED_MC
 Aftr Idle Mode
 
 Settings require a reboot for the relevant modules to be loaded or removed
 This app gives 2 options for applying settings, you can apply setting and reboot later, or apply settings and reboot now
 
 The NEAK OTA section of this app will show the current installation status of the NEAK OTA Updator App and have a button for downloading the app
 
 For help with this app, please go to:
 http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1430137
